City Mayor
----------

**Calvin Shiflet**  
(979) 487-9678  
[cshiflet@clutetexas.gov](http://cshiflet@clutetexas.gov/)

![](https://clutetexas.gov/new/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/cshiflet-300x225.jpg)Mayor Calvin Shiflet was elected to the position as Mayor of the City of Clute in 2006.  Prior to serving as Mayor, Mr. Shiflet served on the Clute Planning and Zoning Commission and is currently of the Economic Development Commission.
